block.p: LEAD: John Cougar Mellencamp's sobriquet ''Little Bastard'' might very well be attributable to his fiery demeanor (''Rebel With a Cause,'' by Timothy White, Sept. 27). Still, it seems strange that in an article titled ''Rebel With a Cause,'' no mention is made of the fact that fellow Indiana native James Dean had the same sobriquet painted on his racing car.
